body: Hello, since I started to play again for a bit I want to get questions and it can be about anything, just keep it related and do not put mean comments or everyone will be sad soo, get started, peeps on the streets!

replies.body:
Welcome back, Kizzy. I was new to the forums when you were here I believe, and my name was NuclearDucky which was a family account. Nice to see you back. :^)

Goldie would be glad to see you again, but he left I believe. :c
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Yeah, I remember reading that he left thats really sad because he was like my brother on here <3 but we have to do things for life sometimes(which I have to do since im grown and not a child any more :( i wish i was again)

replies.body: My cheering sounds familiar because I usually am cheering team(s) on depending if I'm spectating or in game I usually am the only person cheering but I'm sure more people will be cheering also with me. and KizzyFizzy means, well my nickname name is Kizzy (my real name is Kesia) and fizzy because, pop(or soda depending where you are from) is bubbly and that's my personality on here, in rl im a nice person but not a bubbly person but on here, hell yeah!
